chapter.title: Headlines
chapter.simpara: Use = for the headlines, because you see easily the structure
chapter.screen: = Document Title == 1 headline for Chapter === 2 headline for Subchapter ==== 3 headline

chapter.title: Variables
chapter.simpara: Make use of variables if it is useful
Usage within listing blocks needs to be allowed as normally listing provides text "as it is"
or if you want also formatting
Sometimes you need double formatting characters: double asterisks around one or more letters in a word make those letters bold which you also need inside of blocks

chapter.title: Listing Block for commands within the text
chapter.simpara: ONLY use the style of "listing" block, NO OTHER
as OTHERS style destroy all other formatting with DAPS even if the work well in asciidoc direct output
Do NOT use the optional title for the block.

chapter.title: Include of other documents

tip.simpara: Easy to leverage other content with includes

chapter.simpara: DON’T use headlines in these include files, leave the headline placeholders in your main document

chapter.title: Include of images
chapter.simpara: Images needs to be in the subdirectory ./images if you would like to use DAPS relative to your document
